lead_paragraph: The Saudi king’s advisory council has recommended that the government lift its ban on female drivers — but only for women over 30, who must be off the road by 8 p.m., cannot wear makeup behind the wheel and require a male relative’s permission, a member of the council said Friday.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: Advisers Urge King to Let Women Drive
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: Advisers Urge King to Let Women Drive
